title: Cursed Pirate Lagoon Adventure #106
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Abandoned Dock
rooms.description: A rotting wooden dock extends into murky green water. Fog rolls across the lagoon, and the air reeks of brine and decay. A weathered shack stands at the end of the dock, its door hanging loose. In the distance, you can hear the faint sound of ghostly singing.

items.name: old fishing crate
items.description: A splintered wooden crate filled with tangled nets and rusty hooks

items.name: rusty fishing hook
items.description: A large iron hook, still sharp despite the rust

items.name: supply barrel
items.description: A sealed barrel with two compartments inside

items.name: waterlogged journal
items.description: A sailor's journal with barely legible writing
items.text: Last entry, year 1692: Captain Redbeard cursed us all when we mutinied. The treasure lies in the grotto, but only those who know the captain's secrets may enter. His parrot was named Bones, his ship was the Crimson Revenge, and his treasure is buried in the cursed grotto.

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: A brass key green with age and salt corrosion

items.name: weathered shack door
items.description: A door to a small shack, secured with a brass lock

rooms.name: Smuggler's Shack
rooms.description: A cramped shack filled with contraband and stolen goods. Moonlight filters through gaps in the walls. Maps and wanted posters cover every surface. A trapdoor in the floor leads down to darkness below.

items.name: wanted poster for Captain Redbeard
items.description: A faded poster showing a fierce pirate captain
items.text: WANTED DEAD OR ALIVE: Captain Redbeard - Piracy, Murder, Theft. Last seen commanding the Crimson Revenge. Known to keep a parrot named Bones. REWARD: 1000 pieces of eight.

items.name: collection of maps
items.description: Various nautical charts and treasure maps
items.text: One map shows the lagoon with a marking: 'Cursed Grotto - entrance hidden beneath the waves. Beware the guardian spirits.'

items.name: locked smuggler's chest
items.description: A heavy chest bound with iron bands

items.name: enchanted silver compass
items.description: A compass that glows with an eerie blue light

items.name: note about the grotto
items.description: A warning scrawled on parchment
items.text: The grotto entrance asks three questions of all who seek the treasure. Know the captain's name, his parrot's name, and where the treasure lies. Only then will the spirits grant passage.

items.name: wooden trapdoor
items.description: A heavy trapdoor leading down into darkness

rooms.name: Underwater Passage
rooms.description: A partially flooded tunnel carved through rock. Bioluminescent algae provides dim green light. The water is waist-deep and ice cold. Ahead, you can see the entrance to a grotto, blocked by a shimmering barrier of ghostly energy. Three spectral figures float before it, their hollow eyes watching you.

items.name: submerged ship wreckage
items.description: Pieces of a destroyed ship scattered across the tunnel floor

items.name: ship's nameplate
items.description: A brass plate from a ship's hull

items.name: skeleton of a pirate
items.description: The bones of a long-dead pirate, still clutching something

items.name: cursed gold doubloon
items.description: A gold coin that pulses with dark energy

items.name: spectral barrier
items.description: A wall of ghostly energy blocking the grotto entrance. Three phantom voices whisper questions.

password_questions.question: What was the captain's name?
password_questions.hint: Check the wanted poster in the shack

password_questions.question: Where is the treasure buried?
password_questions.hint: Look at the maps and notes you've found

rooms.name: Cursed Treasure Grotto
rooms.description: You have found Captain Redbeard's legendary treasure! The grotto is filled with chests overflowing with gold, jewels, and precious artifacts. In the center, a massive pile of treasure glitters in the light of your enchanted compass. The ghostly singing grows louder, then fades to peaceful silence. A natural tunnel leads upward to freedom and daylight.

items.name: mountain of treasure
items.description: An enormous pile of gold coins, jeweled crowns, and precious gems

items.name: captain's personal chest
items.description: An ornate chest with Captain Redbeard's insignia

items.name: captain's ruby ring
items.description: A magnificent ring with a blood-red ruby, the captain's most prized possession

items.name: ghost of Captain Redbeard
items.description: The translucent spirit of the captain appears, nodding in approval
items.text: The ghost speaks: 'Ye have proven yerself worthy. Take me treasure and lift the curse. May ye sail free, brave soul.'

rooms.win_message: You have discovered Captain Redbeard's cursed treasure and lifted the curse on the lagoon! The ghost of the captain salutes you before fading into peaceful rest. With your pockets full of gold and jewels, you climb through the natural tunnel to freedom. The fog lifts from the lagoon as the curse is finally broken. You win!
